question: 1. permissible to fast on friday only?? 2. explain hadith on fasting of aashura
answer:
QUESTION
1)If you keep a nafil fast on Friday, do you have to keep another fast with it either on Thursday or Saturday? My brother told me that I cannot keep the single fast of Friday (nafil fast). He said if you fast on Friday you have to either fast on Thursday with it or on Saturday. Please clarify. 2)I read this Hadith on 'Quraan.com'.Please explain the meaning of this Ahadith. Narrated Ibn 'Umar: "The Prophet observed the fast on the 10th of Muharram ('Ashura), and ordered (Muslims) to fast on that day, but when the fasting of the month of Ramadan was prescribed, the fasting of the 'Ashura' was abandoned. 'Abdullah did not use to fast on that day unless it coincided with his routine fasting by chance." Does this mean that we cant keep fast on the 10th.If we do than we have to keep fast for one more day either 11th or 9th.And if we dont keep fast on the 9th or 11th with 10th are we commiting a sin .So it this Hadith correct? Jazakalah khairan.
ANSWER


Share:
1. According to the Hanafi Madhab, it is permissible to fast on a Friday
only. There is a Hadith which prohibits a person from fasting on Fridays
only. According to the Hanafi Madhab, it refers to the early stages of Islam
and is not effective anymore.
2. It is correct that Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) ordered the Muslims
to fast on the day of Aashura, but later on, when fasting of Ramadhaan was
prescribed, it was no more obligatory but recommended. When it was brought
to the attention of Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) that the Jews also
fast on this day (10th), Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam)ordered the
Muslims to oppose them.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
